Modules¶

tests module¶

The module was used as an example of a functional test using selenium.

func_test.func_test()¶
Variables

  • safari (webdriver) – Used to operate the safari web-browser

  • localhost_8000 (string) – Holds the localhost url with port number

  • test_text (string) – Hold what string you would like tested

Raises

assertion – Raised if test_text is not in the page source

Returns

nothing

This module is used for creating functional and unit test.

To run this module use the following command: ‘python manage.py test’
